DOC.HEADLINE: PACIFIC WATCH : CHINA
DOC.TEXT: Public Works Plans Outlined : The country needs to spend $ 500 billion in the next decade on public works to ease problems that are hampering economic development , according to official reports . Finance_Minister Liu Zhongli said China would have to raise more funds in overseas capital markets and seek more loans from international financial_organizations and governments , the China Daily said . China ' s investment in infrastructure last year reached about $ 21.4 billion , nearly matching the entire amount invested between 1981 and 1985 , the report said .
